name: Chimairamon
description: Kimeramon is a chimera of various Digimon. It has the head of Kabuterimon , the eyes and hair of MetalGreymon , the body and lower jaw of Greymon , the wings of Airdramon , the top wings of Angemon , the arms of Devimon , the left arm of Kuwagamon , the right arm of SkullGreymon , the legs of Garurumon , and the tail of Monochromon .
